about_the_game:
[IN EARLY DEVELOPMENT] SLIMECORE is a squad-based hero shooter featuring a dynamic roguelite augment system. Four teams enter the Fluxform Arena, but only one will emerge victorious. In this ever-shifting battleground, you'll find countless ways to customize and evolve your team's playstyle. Your mission? Take down the competition using a blend of sharp mechanical skill and strategic game knowledge.

ENTER THE FLUXFORM ARENA

  • Face off against one of three rival crews

  • Defeat them to reduce their overall health

  • Use your winnings to upgrade items and unlock augments

  • Customize and evolve your character into a powerhouse

SHAKE IT UP

SLIMECORE’s roguelite mechanics ensure that no two matches feel the same. A strategy that works in one game may not work in the next! Items and Augments dramatically change how characters play, forcing you to adapt your playstyle each time.

BUDDY UP

Team up with two other players to coordinate strategies, or venture solo into the Fluxform Arena for a more daring experience.

STUDY UP

Choose from 7 unique Core-Hunters, each with distinct abilities (2 abilities, 1 ultimate, and a passive). More Core-Hunters are in development for launch. They can be unlocked through playtime or purchased in the shop.

WIN YOUR OWN WAY

Play your style and innovate on the fly. Discover the perfect build and run it back, or experiment with a new role every round. Hit them with something unexpected and leave them wondering – how did you pull that off?

  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1060 or equivalent
